items.title: Trump at Year One
items.description: The president has governed at a frenzied pace that has produced some real successes, but he also exceeded his authority to advance harebrained ideas.

items.title: Youngkin’s ‘Common Sense’ Legacy in Virginia
items.description: Glenn Youngkin’s single term was easily one of the most successful of any governor in recent memory.

items.title: It’s Time to Ditch ‘Disparate Impact Theory’ — and Biden’s Weaponization of Civil Rights Law
items.description: HUD has proposed a rule to end the agency’s use of this pernicious legal doctrine.

items.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
items.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

items.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
items.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.
